synopsis.text: Aqua, a once barren Mars, has been transformed into a thriving water world in the year 2301. Amidst the canal-laden city of Neo-Venezia, a young girl named Akari Mizunashi harbors a dream: to become a Prima Undine, the city's top gondolier. Despite her unwavering determination, she finds herself grappling with self-doubt as she contemplates leading the prestigious Aria Company on her own. Seeking guidance, she turns to her mentor, Alicia Florence, one of Neo-Venezia's renowned "Water Fairies." Alicia, also the current chairwoman of Aria Company, shares her own past struggles and triumphs, offering Akari a beacon of hope and inspiration to overcome her fears and continue her journey towards achieving her dream.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
